app_description: Here you will find information about the wedding of Judit & Cristian
app_introduction: In this application you will be able to indicate your type of diet, indicate if you have any allergies and other necessary information for the big celebration.
errors_not_implemented_app_text: Unfortunately, this application is not ready yet, but in a blink of an eye you will receive a notification to update it and be able to access all its features.
errors_not_implemented_app_good_bye: We look forward to seeing you soon!
update_ready_text: You just need to update it, click on the button below and you will be able to access all the functionalities.
task_add_people_subtitle: Only accompanying persons who have not registered
